abstract: Palm is trying to revive itself as business users have embraced the BlackBerry and consumers have fallen in love with the iPhone.
snippet: Palm is trying to revive itself as business users have embraced the BlackBerry and consumers have fallen in love with the iPhone.
lead_paragraph: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif. — If anyone knows how best to survive a corporate near-death experience, it is Jon Rubinstein.

headline.main: Palm, Once a Leader, Seeks Path in Smartphone Jungle
headline.print_headline: Palm, Once a Leader, Seeks Path in Smartphone Jungle

abstract: New York City’s Department of Transportation has contracted with the Office for Visual Interaction, a lighting design group, to install and test L.E.D. street lighting. If the tests are successful, the city’s entire stock of 300,000 street lamps could one day be replaced with L.E.D. versions.
snippet: New York City’s Department of Transportation has contracted with the Office for Visual Interaction, a lighting design group, to install and test L.E.D. street lighting. If the tests are successful, the city’s entire stock of 300,000 street lamps c...
lead_paragraph: When a small city, like Calabasas, Calif., does something innovative, like banning outdoor smoking, that’s interesting. But when a big city like New York tries something new, it’s probably time to sit up and take notice.

headline.main: Lighting the Big Apple With L.E.D.’s
